Package edu.unika.aifb.foam.rules

Interface Summary
Rules The core of the mapping process are rules supporting a mapping or not.
 

Class Summary
AllFeaturesRule The user can enter a file containing entities to consider in seperate rules.
EmptyRule Creates an empty rule set.
EqualLabelRule Very simple rule.
IndividualRule Definition of an individual rule.
LabelRule Very simple rule.
ManualRuleSimple This rule set has been created by an expert ontology engineer.
RulesCompleteForML  
RulesCompleteForML2
